'''1.12-pre1'''<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-112-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.12 Pre-Release 1}}</ref> is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.12]], which adds four new advancements, optimizes the recipe book and fixes bugs. This is the first pre-release released in 2017.

== Additions ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Parrot]]'''
* Added new [[attribute]]: <code>generic.flyingSpeed</code>.
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Gamerule]]'''
* <code>gameLoopFunction <namespace:path/to/function/file></code>
** Runs a function every [[tick]] through the server.

=== Command format ===
{{cmd|function <namespace:path/to/function/file>}}
* Runs a function once through the [[entity]] or [[command block]] which ran the /function command.

=== General ===

* Added {{nbt|boolean|hidden}} field to advancement display info, defaults to false.
* Added new <code>effects_changed</code>, <code>used_totem</code>, <code>nether_travel</code> advancements triggers.
* Added {{nbt|string|function}} to advancement rewards.

'''[[Function (Java Edition)|Function]]s'''
* Added new function system, which are plaintext files in <code>world/data/functions/namespace/file.txt</code>.
* Functions are a list of [[commands]], one line per command, with <code>//</code> or <code>#</code> comment support.

'''[[NBT format]]'''
* Added the {{nbt|compound|enteredNetherPosition}} tag for [[player]]s.

== Changes ==
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* Advancement trees are now centered in the UI.
* [[Item]]s & [[entities]] in advancements have an extra <code>NBT</code> field (string NBT, like in commands).
* Entities in advancements have an extra <code>effects</code> and <code>location</code> field.
* Removed <code>commands</code> from advancement rewards.
* Removed <code>arbitrary_player_tick</code> advancement trigger.

'''[[Recipe book]]s'''
* Optimized the recipe book.
